name: Data Rendering - Tech Demo
description:
The project was developed in conjuction with my honors thesis, The Elements of Data Driven Game Development. The github repo is availabe at https://github.com/Jesh17/DataGames

Controls- WASD to move, Move mouse to rotate camera, hold shift to move faster.

Imported assests- Extended Fly Cam

This project was developed using data sourced from USGS Earth Explorer.
